name: Western Mountaineering Puma Microfibre -32C Winter Down Sleeping Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
Puma Microfibre -32C Winter Down Sleeping Bag
description: Mega warmth and big, puffy loft, in a bag weighs only 1.6kg. Insulated with high-lofting goose down, it's ideal for ski touring, and winter mountaineering. 2 densely-packed interlocking draft tubes and a down-filled collar seal out biting cold air. Its V-block side baffle gives you amazing down control, which is key in a bag with this much loft. MicroLite XP™ shell is breathable yet extremely weather-resistant.MicroLite XP shell.Insulated with goose down.Side baffles with15cm spacing.Interlocking draft tubes.
